content.body: Japanese writing is not unique among scripts for often not using spaces; it’s interesting that the article focuses on it. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scriptio_continua#Examples

* Japanese writing is not unique among scripts for often not using spaces between words (Chinese and Thai often do not use them either); it’s interesting that the article focuses on Japanese. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scriptio_continua#Examples
